short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link from IMDb to OMDb API to get useful details in a readable format. You must have an OMDb api key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link from an IMDb movie page to the OMDb API page. Instructions to set up and use this extension: 1. Install the extension. 2. Go to the extension options page. 3. Enter your OMDb API key, which you can get from https://www.omdbapi.com/apikey.aspx. 4. Paste the API key in the options page of this extension and press save. 5. Go to any IMDb movie page, right-click and select 'Link to OMDb'. 6. If Readable HTML is enabled, it will load a formatted OMDb page with movie details instead of the OMDb's JSON page. If you find this extension useful, please consider donating to OMDb at https://www.omdbapi.com
